attributes.action: set up schools where religious and scientific understandings are used to develop positive virtues.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To promote the relative truth of both science and religion. To promote harmonious discourse between these systems of thinking. To analyse positive and negative behaviour.     
To promote the unity within all faiths on the practice of virtues.  To promote philosophical reasoning, intuition, and imagination. To promote the vigour of scientific investigation. To promote religious and scientific harmony and non prejudice.
To demand excellence and perfection of pupils.

To suspend all judgment and fixed assumptions about any system that tries to explain the universe, and instead look at the practices that religion and science promote, and to focus on their benefits.
